name: Magnebit
description:
The 2nd game in my commemoration project (a fun project where I'm going to remake some of our old games with pico-8 in my free time). Originally, it was a prototype by @netcell and @vunq90 for Construct 3 Game jam, featured a short narrative about Love triangle and visualized into gameplay by the interaction of 3 magnetic entities.

However, its mechanic has a lot of flaws. We wanted to fix it, add a few levels and polish it but never had time for that, so it was scrapped. Now I bring it to pico-8, simplify it, remove the narrative and multiple-choices ending, adjusting some level as well. Hope you enjoy!

Stage Goal:

Get one ball to the maze entrance

Controls:

  • Player uses Arrow keys to move all balls in desired direction
  • Player cannot control the balls while they are still moving, the balls will not stop unless they hit an obstacle
